name: Panasonic HDC-Z10000 Twin-Lens 2D/3D Camcorder

RECORDING SECTION Recording Media SD Memory Card : 512 MB, 1 GB, 2 GB SDHC Memory Card : 4 GB, 6 GB, 8 GB, 12 GB, 16 GB, 24 GB, 32 GB SDXC Memory Card : 48 GB, 64 GB SD Memory Card slot 2 slots Recording Format AVCHD 2.0 Standard (AVCHD 3D / Progressive) Compliant Compression Method [2D] MPEG-4 AVC / H.264 [3D] MPEG-4 MVC / H.264 Signal System [3D] 1080/60i*1, 1080/30p*1*2, 1080/24p*1 [2D] 1080/60p*1, 1080/60i*1, 1080/30p*1*2, 1080/24p*1 Thumbnail Display 20 thumbnails/page, 9 thumbnails/page, 1 thumbnails/page Simultaneous Still Image Recording Recording Format JPEG (DCF / Exif2.2), MPO (CIPA-007-2009) <Aspect Ratio> 16:9 Image Size 3 megapixels [JPEG], (2304 x 1296), 2.1 megapixels [JPEG], (1920 x 1080), 2.1 megapixels [MPO + JPEG], (1920 x 1080) AUDIO SECTION Recording System Dolby Digital 5.1 / 2 ch, Linear PCM 2 ch Sampling Frequency 48 kHz Quantization 16 bit Compressed Bit-Rate Dolby Digital : 384 kbps (5.1 ch), 256 kbps (2 ch) Linear PCM : 1.5 Mbps (2ch) Internal Microphone 5.1 Surround Mic, Zoom Mic, Gun Mic, Stereo Mic XLR Input XLR 3-pin × 2 (INPUT 1, INPUT 2) LINE: 0 dBu, MIC: -50 dBu/-60 dBu (selectable in menu) HDMI Output Dolby Digital, Linear PCM Headphone Output Stereo mini jack (3.5 mm diameter) × 1 Built-in Speaker Dynamic Type (round) GENERAL SECTION Power Supply 7.2V (Battery) / 12V (AC Adaptor) Power Consumption Max. 16.7W (Recording) Dimensions (W x H x D)  Approx. 145 x 195 x 350 [mm] - (5.7 x 7.68 x 13.8 [inch]) Weight (w/o battery and SD card)  Approx. 1600g (3.53 lb) Operating Temperature 0 °C to 40 °C (32 °F to 104 °F) Operating Humidity 10 % to 80 % (No Condensation) LCD Monitor 3.48" (8.83 cm) 16:9 Wide 3D LCD monitor (1,152,000 dots) View Finder 0.45" (11.5 mm) 16:9 Wide EVF (Approx. 1,226,880 dots) Manual Ring Zoom, Focus, Iris Manual Dial 3D Convergence HDMI HDMI Terminal type A x 1 HDMI Output 1080p, 1080i, 480p, 576p
